## Examples

**Basic**

```js
<SelectChoicesWidget style={{ width: 300 }} choices={[[1, 'one'], [2, 'two'], [3, 'three']]} />
```

**Grouping**
```js
<SelectChoicesWidget
    style={{ width: 300 }}
    choices={[
        ['Managers', [['lucy', 'Lucy'], ['sam', 'Sam']]],
        ['Developers', [['sally', 'Sally'], ['tom', 'Tom']]],
    ]}
/>
```
